template.p: Hello there!
You just installed the Odoo for Holiday House package. By doing so, we have installed a bunch of necessary apps to run your bar efficiently.
Discover the basics of this package and explore all the possibilities Odoo offers to improve your experience.

Manage your customers from the Contact App

div.p: You didn't import demo data? You can still do it. Go to Apps > Industries > Upgrade your package and check the related box

template.p: You holiday house is online and future guests found it!

ul.li: Open the Website App and navigate to the Houses.
Click one of the house to book.
Adjust the rental dates, click the book button and then proceed to checkout.
Click the Pay with demo button, and then Pay button to mimic the payment.
Once confirmed, the payment is done and the order booked seamlessly!

template.p: You're now waiting for your guest to arrive.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: At any time from the guest order, use the Send message capability in the chatter to exchange with your guest.

template.p: They were happy about their stay, let's ask them to leave a review.

ul.li:
Anyone can create a portal account on your database.
Open your website home page in a private tab to do so.
Once done, loggin as a portal user.
Open a house page from the website and scroll down to the Customer Reviews section.
Adjust the number of stars, leave a comment and send it!

template.p:
From the Holiday House App, you can manage your bookings.
The Holiday House App relies on the Rental and Planning Apps binding, with a few customizations.
You have a future guest on the line willing to book a house?

ul.li: Open the Holiday House App to appreciate the currently planned bookings with the Schedule.
During an available period, click, drag and drop on a house line to create a slot.
Click the Create Order to open the order form.
Select or create a customer and then confirm the booking!

template.h4: Your customer wants to stay longer?

ul.li: Type in the customer name in the Schedule search bar filtering by Customer.
Click the tail of the corresponding booking and drag it to the requested date.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: Alternatively, switch to the list view, which is more suitable if the booking is not during the visualized date range and update the booking date range.

template.p: You are repairing a house or simply welcoming family and don't want guests to book a house?

ul.li: Open the Holiday House App Schedule.
On the house to block line, click, drag and drop to create a slot.
This time, simply leave a note about the why this is booked and save the slot.

template.p: Welcome your guests as well from the Holiday House App.
You welcome your first guests, awesome!

ul.li: Open the Holiday House App and then navigate to the orders from the menu.
From the search bar select the Today filter to see to check in and to check out orders.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: Alternatively, type in the search bar and select the appropriate filter.

ul.li: Open the order of you just arrived guests.
Click the Check in button to confirm they are now staying at your place!

template.p: Recording the guest attendance is an obligation in numerous countries.

ul.li: Still from their Rental Order, open the Guests tab.
Add here as many of them as needed.
Assign them a resource, which helps you keeping track.

template.p: You noticed that the Identity Check highlights whether you captured all the necessary information for a guest?

ul.li: If not OK, then click the contact, fill in the Identity section and save the contact.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: You could customize this section to add the identity document picture or extra fields at your convenience with studio. Just be careful, such customizations can quickly become messy.

template.p: Again, the Holiday House App helps you manage the end of the stay!

ul.li: Open your guest order from the Holiday House App.
Click the Check out button to capture they return you the keys.
Check and adjust if needed the number of guest who stayed in each room. Then confirm the number of city tax to be charged, which updated the delivered city tax count.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.div: City Taxes are to be billed to spent nights in practice and not in theory and are counted as the sum of nights each guest stayed.
Example: A room for 2 is booked for 4 nights, two guests were here for the first three nights but only one stayed the last night. Then the guests x nights is 2x3+1x1=7.

template.p: At any time you can adjust the city tax count delivered by re-opening the city tax widget clicking the City Tax button on the guest order.

ul.li: Open the guest order.
Click the Invoice button with a full invoice.
Check the invoice data and confirm it.
Charge your customer for the resulting amount and you're all set!

p.em: Don't forget to thank your guests with a warm goodbye!
